english: I have no preference between the two wines .
chinese: 我对这两种酒没有偏爱。

english: She has a partiality for french cheese .
Nature had surely formed her in a partial mood .
chinese: 大自然肯定是怀着偏爱的心情创造了她。

english: Providence was more especially on the side of clever people .
chinese: 上天总是更加偏爱聪明人。

english: This predisposition may bespeak a different mentality .
chinese: 这种偏爱可能说明不同的心智状态。
偏爱造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The order they are proved in is a matter of taste .
chinese: 它们被证明的次序只是出于作者的偏爱。

english: He was reminded of his father's devotion to his garden .
chinese: 他想起了他的父亲对自己这个花园的偏爱。

english: Every family has one child whom the others think is favored .
chinese: 每一个家庭都有一个别人认为是受到偏爱的孩子。

english: Women attuned to sensitive men found vincent lord attractive .
chinese: 偏爱敏感男子的女人，觉得文森特洛德具有魅力。

english: He obtained his position by favour more than by merit and ability .
chinese: 他靠别人的偏爱而非靠自己的长处和能力谋得他的职位。

english: She had prejudices on the side of ancestry; she had a value for rank and consequence .
chinese: 她有些偏爱名门贵族，尊崇高官厚位。

english: His preference for fitzgerald and moy was another yard off the same cloth .
chinese: 他对费茨杰拉德和莫伊的偏爱是差不多同样性质的。

english: She was fanciful, had all sorts of unspoken preferences, and was easily offended .
chinese: 她喜欢空想，有着种种不说出口的偏爱，并且容易生气。
